# ==============================================
# Source:
# - Hui Wan, r3471
# - Variables vct_a and vct_b in
#   /scratch/work/system/pool/data/ECHAM6/T63/T63L47_jan_spec.nc
#   from MPI-M.
# Comments:
# - Standard vertical grid for ECHAM6 simulations including the
#   troposphere, stratosphere and mesosphere.
# - Resolves atmosphere from surface to 1 Pa (0.01 mbar).
# - Includes mass of the whole atmosphere: ptop=0.
# References:
# - n.a.
